artists.name: Vincent van Gogh
artists.summary: A post-impressionist painter known for his expressive brushwork and vibrant colors.

artworks.title: Starry Night
artworks.summary: Depicts a swirling night sky over a tranquil townscape.

artworks.title: Sunflowers
artworks.summary: A series of vibrant still-life paintings of sunflowers.

artworks.title: The Bedroom
artworks.summary: A painting of Van Gogh's bedroom with simplistic yet expressive details.

artists.name: Claude Monet
artists.summary: A founding figure of French Impressionism, renowned for his landscapes and water lilies.

artworks.title: Impression, Sunrise
artworks.summary: The painting that inspired the name of the Impressionist movement.

artworks.title: Water Lilies
artworks.summary: A series of paintings capturing the beauty of Monet's water lily pond.

artworks.title: Woman with a Parasol
artworks.summary: A painting of Monet's wife and son in a sunlit landscape.

artists.name: Pablo Picasso
artists.summary: A revolutionary artist who co-founded the Cubist movement and pushed the boundaries of modern art.

artworks.title: Guernica
artworks.summary: A powerful anti-war mural responding to the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War.

artworks.title: Les Demoiselles d'Avignon
artworks.summary: A groundbreaking work that marked the beginning of Cubism.

artworks.title: The Weeping Woman
artworks.summary: An emotionally charged depiction of suffering and grief during wartime.
